headline: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) Calls for Rejection of Shareholder Proposal on Voting Requirements
summary: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) recently urged shareholders to oppose a proposal by John Chevedden aiming to alter its voting requirements, aligning the company’s governance more closely with standard practices. This shareholder activism and resistance to proposed governance changes could be influencing investor sentiment. The company's stock moved down by 1.6% over the last week. This price decline comes despite broader market gains, where major U.S. stock indexes, including the Dow Jones and S&P 500,...
